entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Mont-Tremblant

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
